name: Cosmopolitan
description: One thing is certain, the Cosmopolitan is outdated, but just like the cocktail as a whole, it just needs a little help to get back on track!
directions: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker and mix vigorously for 15 seconds.
If you wish to respect the original recipe of the cosmo, take an orange peel and press it over the glass and in front of a match to ignite the orange essential oils on the surface of the peel.
